h1.content: display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; color: #1B5E20; border: 2px solid #1B5E20; padding: 5px 20px;

h2.base: margin: 28px 0 16px; font-size: 1.5em; line-height: 1.5; background: #E8F5E9; padding: 8px 12px; border-left: 6px solid #2E7D32;

h3.content: font-weight: bold; color: #2E7D32; border-bottom: 2px solid #A5D6A7; display: inline-block;

styles.paragraph: line-height: 1.8; margin-top: 1em; font-size: 1em; color: #333333; text-align: justify;

code.block: color: #e0e0e0; background: #263238; border-radius: 4px; border: 4px solid #37474F; margin: 1.2em 0; padding: 1em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.6; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Consolas, Monaco, monospace;
code.inline: background: #E8F5E9; padding: 2px 6px; border-radius: 2px; color: #1B5E20; font-size: 14px; border: 1px solid #C8E6C9;

styles.quote: border-left: 4px solid #2E7D32; padding: 10px 15px; background: #F1F8E9; margin: 0.8em 0; color: #33691E; font-family: 'KaiTi', serif; font-size: 1.05em;
styles.image: max-width: 100%; height: auto; margin: 1em auto; display: block; border: 1px solid #ddd; padding: 5px; background: #fff;

emphasis.strong: font-weight: bold; color: #1B5E20; background: linear-gradient(180deg, transparent 60%, #C8E6C9 60%);

table.container: width: 100%; margin: 1em 0; border-collapse: collapse; border: 1px solid #CFD8DC;
table.header: background: #ECEFF1; font-weight: bold; color: #37474F; border-bottom: 2px solid #CFD8DC; font-size: 1em;
